content.para: Release 3.16.2 updates third party libraries (jackson, simple-xml) to accomodate for security-related patches.

td.p: Jackson library has been upgraded to version 2.9.9. Simple-xml library has been repackaged and now comes in a "safe" variant that prevents XXE attacks. If you use the DCS, please upgrade immediately.
Java 1.8 is required for this release to work. Note that the Workbench requires exactly Java 1.8 (it will not work with any newer Java version).

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA
